SELECT
MIN(CASE to_char(A.TM, 'hh24') when #{info.index} THEN A.DRP END) AS #{info.drp},
A.STCD,MIN(A.DYP) AS DYP FROM (select R.STCD, R.TM, R.DRP,(CASE to_char(R.TM, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24') WHEN #{time} || '08' THEN R.DYP END) AS DYP FROM ST_PPTN_R R WHERE (to_char(R.TM, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = #{time} OR to_char(R.TM, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = #{tomorTime} AND to_char(R.TM, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24') >= #{time} || '08' AND to_char(R.TM, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24') <= #{tomorTime} || '07' AND R.STCD = #{stcd} ) A GROUP BY A.STCD
